name: Super Mario 64 H
description:
For the best experience, playing with a controller is optimal.

Welcome to Super Mario 64 H! The H in this case stands for Hours as this is simply a test project to see how much of Mario 64  I could recreate in 64 hours! 

Check out how it was made here!



  • Controls - Keyboard:
  • WASD = Move Mario
  • Shift = Run
  • Space = Jump
  • Arrow Keys = Move Camera
  • G = Taunt
  • Controls - Controller (Xbox):
  • Left Stick = Move Mario
  • X = Run
  • A = Jump
  • Right Stick = Move Camera
  • Dpad-Up = Taunt
